machine_start_gcode:
PRINT_START BED=[first_layer_bed_temperature] HOTEND=[first_layer_temperature] CHAMBER=[chamber_temperature]
M83
G0 X{max(first_layer_print_min[0], 0)} Y{first_layer_print_min[1]-5} Z5 F6000.0 ; position 5mm down from the lower left of the first layer at 5mm from bed
G0 Z[initial_layer_print_height] F600 ; Move down to first layer height at slower speed
G1 E3 F1800 ; Prime the extruder with 3mm of filament at 1800mm/min
G4 P300 ; wait 300ms before drawing line
G1 X{max(first_layer_print_min[0], 0)+50} Y{first_layer_print_min[1]-5} E{50* 0.5 * initial_layer_print_height * nozzle_diameter[0]} F1000 ; extrude filament 50mm in the x direction
G1 X{max(first_layer_print_min[0], 0)+53} Z0 ; move an additional 3mm without extruding while scraping nozzle on bed
G1 X{max(first_layer_print_min[0], 0)+55} ; move an additional 2mm without extruding while scraping nozzle on bed
G1 Z1 F600 ; Z-hop up to avoid collision
name: Qidi Q1 Pro 0.4 nozzle - OQ1 FreeDi Setup custom purge
printer_settings_id: Qidi Q1 Pro 0.4 nozzle - OQ1 FreeDi Setup custom purge
